casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Toni TURNAGE 181P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 20, 2018 Mr. Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Ms. Katherine Whitney Dickinson-Schultz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Turnage, Toni

Mr. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender

Mr. Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of June 2018 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of June 2018."
